適應症: 神經炎、腳氣病、口唇炎、舌炎、癩皮病、皮膚炎、貧血、多發性神經炎、嘔吐、妊娠引起的噁心、維他命Ｂ群缺乏症
主成分略述: CALCIUM DIPHOSPHATE (CALCIUM PYROPHOSPHATE), CHOLINE, BIOTIN, NIACINAMIDE (NICOTINAMIDE), YEAST (TORULA YEAST), VITAMIN B1 (MONONITRATE), RIBOFLAVIN (VIT B2), PYRIDOXINE HCL, VITAMIN B12 (COBALAMIN CONC.), FOLIC ACID, PANTOTHENATE D- CALCIUM, INOSITOL (MESO-INOSITOL), RIBONUCLEIC ACID
申請商地址: 台北巿仁愛路二段３４號６Ｆ之１
